vote.title: Authorize (1) a Standard Utility Agreement with the State of Texas, acting through the Texas Department of Transportation, for water pipeline encasement extensions in FM 548 from Windmill Farms to State Highway 205; and (2) the receipt and deposit of funds in the amount of $68,377.73 in the Dallas Water Utilities Fund from the Texas Department of Transportation for reimbursement of eligible construction, inspection, and project management costs for the project - Estimated Revenue: Dallas Water Utilities Fund $68,377.73
vote.description: Authorize (1) a Standard Utility Agreement with the State of Texas, acting through the Texas Department of Transportation, for water pipeline encasement extensions in FM 548 from Windmill Farms to State Highway 205; and (2) the receipt and deposit of funds in the amount of $68,377.73 in the Dallas Water Utilities Fund from the Texas Department of Transportation for reimbursement of eligible construction, inspection, and project management costs for the project - Estimated Revenue: Dallas Water Utilities Fund $68,377.73
